data_table.description: Diabetes Mellitus Status, Original Cohort Exams 1 - 28. Variables include blood glucose levels, current treatment for diabetes, and diabetes mellitus status. Blood glucose was not measured at exams 5, 7, 11, 12, 24, and 25. Therefore, there is no measure of diabetes mellitus status at these exams. This dataset replaces vr_diab_ex27_0_0438s.

variable.name: IDTYPE
variable.comment: IDTYPE and ID taken together form a unique study participant identification number.

variable.name: DMRX1
variable.comment: For Exams 1 - 10, the current treatment variable value (DMRX) was determined through chart review. Current treatment was assigned to the exam where the study participant first used insulin or first used an oral hypoglycemic agent. Current treatment was then carried forward through Exam 10 (whether attended exam or not).

variable.comment: For Exams 1 - 10, the current treatment variable value (DMRX) was determined through chart review.
